bibl.note: The Pathyrite nome by the end of the second and the start of the first century B.C.
bibl.seg: ABD EL-GHANI Mohammed, The Pathyrite Nome in Upper Egypt in the Light of Greek Papyri.

Jean-Claude GOYON et Christine CARDIN (Edd. / Édd.), Proceedings of the Ninth International Congress of Egyptologists / Actes du neuvième Congrès international des égyptologues, Grenoble, 6-12 septembre 2004. Volume I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 150 (Leuven - Paris - Dudley, MA, 2007) pp. 33-53.
The Pathyrite nome by the end of the second and the start of the first century B.C.
